title: How Exactly do we Level up on Boards? I cant find a team because of this.
body:
Hey I currently am 15 level on lol, but the boards show that I'm less than level 10 so I cant create any discussions in teams.

I need help..

{{summoner:3}}

Edit: Nevermind thanks it instantly leveled me up when I posted this discussion lol

replies.body: Glad to hear everything is sync'd up now.  Good luck finding your dream team!
Thatâ€™s usually what was needed: a kick in the butt for the boards to update your level :)
